messages.1000090844:
Enhances the Blessing of Strikes skill.
If a Lightning Relic + is placed nearby, you can summon a small relic using the regular attack button after casting Blessing of Strikes. The small relic will deal damage that's {0}x the total damage of the Lightning Relic + to surrounding areas. It also gives a debuff that increases damage taken by the target.
